title: Full-Length Embroidered Silk Gown
image_prompt: high-resolution flat-lay product render of a full-length gown, crafted from deep navy silk with intricate gold floral embroidery throughout, isolated on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, ornate gold trims along hem and cuffs, no model, no mannequin
techpack: Full-length A-line gown in silk satin with cotton lining, featuring all-over floral embroidery in gold thread, boat neckline, long sleeves with embroidered cuffs, scalloped hem, side zipper closure. Seam allowances 1cm, embroidery density medium for durability.
provenance: Designed by in-house team inspired by traditional Indian embroidery and contemporary eveningwear trends.
